sentences: On this issue (FCCC/SBSTA/2013/INF.3, FCCC/SBSTA/2013/MISC.1, Add.1& 2), Saint Lucia, for AOSIS, highlighted the need for an overarching decision on rules and procedures for the second commitment period.
Malawi, for the LDCs, cautioned against undermining the Marrakesh Accords, but supported a decision on this matter.
